TopicTitle: Mod that makes science transmission time instead of power

Articles.Content: I was just wondering if there was any mod that makes science transmission a function of time instead of how much power you have onboard, since I have many probes that don't have enough electricity to transmit anything

On 8/4/2024 at 3:20 PM, Bored Kerman said:

I was just wondering if there was any mod that makes science transmission a function of time instead of how much power you have onboard, since I have many probes that don't have enough electricity to transmit anything

Kerbalism.
